alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 10:00AM CDT until May 28 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying farmland and other rural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage this afternoon to 13.2 feet and then begin rising Sunday evening. It will then rise again to 13.4 feet early Monday morning. It will fall to 12.1 feet and then begin rising Tuesday morning then rise again. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River La Cygne 25.0 25.4 Fri 9am 25.2 18.3 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
